description: A choose-your-own-adventure game built with visual blocks

blocks.label: Display Intro
blocks.text: Welcome to the Enchanted Forest! You are a brave adventurer.

blocks.label: First Choice
blocks.question: You come to a fork in the path. Which way do you go?

options.text: Take the dark, mysterious left path
Take the sunny, cheerful right path

blocks.label: Left Path
blocks.text: You venture down the dark path and discover a hidden cave with glittering treasures!

blocks.label: Right Path
blocks.text: You walk down the sunny path and meet a friendly talking fox!

blocks.label: Treasure Decision
blocks.question: What do you do with the treasure?

options.text: Take as much as you can carry

blocks.label: Fox Interaction
blocks.question: The fox offers to guide you. Do you trust it?

blocks.label: Greedy Ending
blocks.text: You become too greedy and the cave collapses! You escape but learn a valuable lesson about greed.

blocks.label: Wise Ending
blocks.text: Your wisdom impresses the cave guardian, who grants you a magical artifact! You win!

blocks.label: Fox Guide Ending
blocks.text: The fox leads you to a secret garden where you become the guardian of nature! Perfect ending!

blocks.label: Solo Ending
blocks.text: You find your own way and discover you're braver than you thought! A good ending.

blocks.label: Player Name
blocks.prompt: What is your name, brave adventurer?
